alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Irwin; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Irwin, northern Berrien, southeastern Tift and south central Ben Hill Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 115 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ocilla to near Enigma to near Unionville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tifton, Ocilla, Enigma, Alapaha, Mystic, Phillipsburg, Unionville, Vanceville, Eldorado, Gladys, Osierfield, Glory, Harding, Pinetta, Bannockburn, Tift Airport, Fender, Wray and Brookfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for south central Georgia.
